value.title: IBM’s Research Group Set To Simplify Enterprise AI
value.excerpt: We believe IBM is going to bring its AI research for improved power efficient AI to mainstream data centers. To effectively use its reduced precision AI hardware, it's critical that there be the right software support.

value.title: Qualcomm unveils chips to power the next generation of smartphones
value.excerpt: Qualcomm unveiled its new Snapdragon 778G5G mobile processor platform to power high-end smartphones coming in the second quarter.

value.title: Google Adds a Suite of New AI Tech for Photos and More
value.excerpt: One of the features Google debuted, dubbed “cinematic moments,” will use machine learning to animate groups of two or three similar photos, using the images to, for example, create a gif of your dog.

value.title: Google details new AI accelerator chips
value.excerpt: Google detailed TPUv4 at Google I/O 2021. They're accelerator chips that deliver high performance on AI workloads.

value.excerpt: Google has announced two major advancements in the field of AI-v4 TPUs and the LaMBDA model for more natural AI conversations.

value.title: The 10 Hottest AI Chipmakers You Should Be Watching In 2021

value.title: Samsung raises spending in logic chip businesses to $151 billion
value.excerpt: Samsung is adding another 38 trillion won, around $33.5 billion, to its prior commitment to inject 133 trillion won into its logic business in a bid to become the world leader in that space.

value.title: U.S. FCC asks what impact chips shortage has on communications sector
value.excerpt: The Federal Communications Commission (FCC) is studying the impact of the global shortage of semiconductors on the communications sector.

value.title: Edge AI chipset developer Sima.ai raises $80M
value.excerpt: Sima.ai, a startup developing an edge AI accelerator chipset, has secured $80 million in venture capital backing.

value.title: Mythic raises $70M to disrupt AI chips with analog and flash components
value.excerpt: Mythic has raised $70 million to fund the analog-based AI processors it plans to launch later this year. Mythic has spent nine years coming up with a patented, potentially disruptive way to compete with other makers of artificial intelligence chips.

value.title: Pushing Computing to the Edge With Innovative Microchip Design to Make AI Accessible in Real-Time
value.excerpt: Responding to artificial intelligence’s exploding demands on computer networks, Princeton University researchers in recent years have radically increased the speed and slashed the energy use of specialized AI systems.

value.title: U.S. Senate committee revised a draft bill to fund AI, quantum, biotech
value.excerpt: The U.S. Senate will consider a revised technology research bill to invest $95 billion in AI, semiconductors, quantum computing, and biotech.

value.title: Samsung develops an innovative I-Cube4 chip packaging technology: Faster & Efficient
value.excerpt: Amidst the global chip shortage, leading chipmaker Samsung has announced a new chip packaging technology. Potentially, the new technology could yield more efficient and faster chips using an innovative chip-packing technique.

value.title: IBM Sets Another Smallness Record with 2nm Chip Blueprints
value.excerpt: IBM said the new chip is designed to achieve 45 percent higher performance and 75 percent lower energy use than today’s most advanced 7nm node chips.

value.title: How the USPS uses Nvidia GPUs and A.I. to track missing mail
value.excerpt: You've got mail! But where is it? The USPS is leaning on A.I. at the edge and GPU-accelerated computing to help track and locate missing mail and packages.
